title: Why is group B played last?
body: Why is week 2 of groups played in the order of A, C, D, B?

replies.body: Groups A, C, and D played on Day 1.  Group B played their first games on Day 2.  It's following the same format as week 1.  Only Riot would know why they did up like that. =b
probably because skt is in that group. lets give them the most rest.
My only guess is that riot never learned their ACD's... errm ABC's

I think before the Every group games played schedule, most of the Group B games were played on the last day before the "group schedule" was out.  IDK but if it is the case I think Group D should have played first cause it's been a longer stretch since they played. 

DAY 1 A A C C D D   SEPT 29TH 
DAY 2 B B D D C C   SEPT 30TH 
DAY 3 A A B B D D    OCT 1ST 
DAY 4 C C A A B B    OCT 2ND 

DAY 5 A A A A A A ( OT) A  OCT 6TH 

SO if anything Group D should have played first since the next time we will see them they will have ( 8 Days to prepare since they last played) While Group A had 4 days, Group B have 7 Days and Group C days days.
Could be random. I don't really know for sure, but that makes the most sense.
